webApp.name: STORE APP (CONSUMPTION) PROJECT
webApp.description: AlBorg Labs Store Management System is a full-stack web application built for AlBorg Lab branches to efficiently manage their internal medical inventory.The platform allows each branch to manage stock levels, orders, daily consumption, item transfers, and periodic inventory audits, while generating professional PDF & Excel reports and sending expiry alerts to prevent stock losses.This system was developed as a freelance project to replace manual processes with a centralized, secure, and automated digital workflow.
libraries: express , mongoose , JWT , bcrypt , multer , pdfkit / pdfmake
exceljs / xlsx , socket.io , slugify , nanoid , dotenv , helmet , express-rate-limit , express-mongo-sanitize
xss-clean , hpp , joi , react , react-router-dom , axios , @tanstack/react-query
formik , yup , bootstrap / react-bootstrap , sweetalert2 , react-modal , react-paginate
feature: Generate downloadable PDF invoices & stock reports
Export Excel files for accounting & auditing
webApp.role: I designed and developed the project end-to-end — including backend architecture, database modeling, API design, frontend integration, and deployment.I also implemented security controls, optimization, and real-time communication between users.

webApp.name: E-COMMERCE PROJECT FULL-STACK
webApp.description: A production-ready backend system for an e-commerce platform that allows users to browse products, create accounts, add items to a shopping cart, and complete secure online payments via Fawaterak payment gateway.The backend handles user authentication, cart & order management, invoice generation, QR codes, email notifications, and real-time order updates. It’s designed with security, scalability, and modular REST architecture in mind.
skills_Back: Nodemailer for sending order confirmations and invoices
database: Schemas for users, products, carts, orders, and payments
feature: Add to cart prompts account creation
PDF invoice generation and QR code tracking
Email notifications for orders and invoices
Secure JWT authorization and request validation
webApp.role: Backend Developer — System Architecture & API Development Responsible for designing and implementing all backend services, RESTful APIs, authentication, payment integration, PDF invoicing, and real-time updates.

front.name: TEMPLATE ONE PROJECT
front.description: Leon Template is a creative & minimal agency website template built to showcase services, portfolio projects, and company information. The website includes interactive features, smooth navigation, responsive layout, social media integration, and contact capabilities. It is suitable for presenting agency profiles or personal portfolios
feature: Interactive features for services and portfolio
front.role: Designing and developing a full creative agency website from scratch.Developing main sections: Services, Portfolio, About, and Contact.Creating an interactive user interface with Font Awesome icons, interactive buttons, and Google Fonts.Enhancing user experience with a responsive and toggleable navigation menu (Hamburger Menu).Integrating social media and email links interactively.

front.name: DANIELS PROJECT
front.description: Personal Portfolio Website showcasing  DANIELS’s professional profile. The website includes team members, services offered (Web Design, Web Development, App Development), skills with progress bars, client testimonials with star ratings, and a contact form. Features responsive navigation, interactive elements, and social media integration. Built with semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for interactivity, with attention to cross-browser consistency.
front.role: Designing and developing a full creative agency website from scratch.Developing main sections: Services, Portfolio, About, and Contact.Creating an interactive user interface with Font Awesome icons, interactive buttons, and Google Fonts.Enhancing user experience with a responsive and toggleable navigation menu (Hamburger Menu).Integrating social media and email links interactively.

front.name: TEMPLATE TWO PROJECT
front.description: Development of a full-featured creative agency website from scratch with modern, responsive, and interactive design. The website includes key sections such as Landing, Services, Portfolio, Design Features, About, Skills & Testimonials, Pricing, Subscribe, Contact, and Footer.
feature: Landing Section: Interactive hero with navigation arrows and slide indicators
Services Section: Icon-based service descriptions using Font Awesome
Portfolio Section: Filterable image gallery with captions and hover effects
Design Section: Highlighting responsive, modern, clean, and browser-friendly design
About Section: Company introduction with images and statistics
Skills & Testimonials: Progress bars for skills and testimonial carousel
Pricing Section: Multiple pricing plans with CTA buttons
Contact Section: Contact form, phone numbers, and company address
Footer Section: Social media links and copyright information
front.role: Designing and developing a full creative agency website from scratch.Developing main sections: Services, Portfolio, About, and Contact.Creating an interactive user interface with Font Awesome icons, interactive buttons, and Google Fonts.Enhancing user experience with a responsive and toggleable navigation menu (Hamburger Menu).Integrating social media and email links interactively.

front.name: TEMPLATE THREE PROJECT
front.description: Development of a full-featured personal blog and portfolio website from scratch with modern, responsive, and interactive design. The website includes sections like Landing, Articles, Gallery, Features, Skills & Testimonials, Team Members, Services, How It Works, Events, Pricing, Videos, Stats, Discount Form, Contact, and Footer.
skills_Front: Contact, subscription, and discount request forms
feature: Landing Section: Interactive hero with welcome text, images, and scroll-down navigation
Articles Section: Multiple article cards with images, titles, excerpts, and read-more links
Gallery Section: Filterable image gallery with hover effects
Features Section: Highlighting quality, time, and passion with images and call-to-action links
Skills & Testimonials: Progress bars for skills and testimonial carousel with star ratings
Team Members Section: Member profiles with images, social media links, and short descriptions
Services Section: Icon-based service descriptions with links for more details
How It Works Section: Step-by-step workflow with images and descriptions
Events Section: Countdown timer for latest events with subscription form
Pricing Section: Multiple pricing plans with clear features and CTA buttons
Videos Section: Featured videos with thumbnails, durations, and descriptions
Stats Section: Key metrics display (clients, projects, countries, revenue)
Discount Section: Request form for discount with input validation
Contact & Footer: Contact info, social media links, location, business hours, and gallery thumbnails
front.role: Full design and development of the website layout.Implemented interactive UI components, responsive behavior, and animations.Structured sections to ensure a modern, engaging, and user-friendly experience.Integrated media elements and dynamic content across the website.

front.name: KERRI PORTFOLIO PROJECT
front.description: Development of a responsive, modern, and fully interactive personal portfolio and agency template. The website showcases all essential sections including Home, About, Services, Testimonials, Portfolio, Blog, Contact, and Footer, with smooth navigation and user-friendly design.
skills_Front: Responsive Design using Bootstrap and media queries
feature: Home Section: Full-screen hero with animated text and CV download button
About Section: Personal introduction with image, description, and social links
Services Section: Card-based services with icons and descriptions
Client/Testimonials Section: Carousel slider for client feedback
Portfolio Section: Filterable project gallery with overlay captions
Blog Section: Cards for latest blog posts with images and excerpts
Contact Section: Contact form with name, email, subject, and message inputs; info cards with phone, address, and email
Footer Section: Social media links and copyright notice
front.role: Full front-end development and design of the websiteImplemented responsive layout, interactive components, and animationsStructured sections for modern portfolio and agency presentation

back.name: E-COMMERCE PROJECT BACK-END
back.description: This project is a production-ready backend system for a complete E-Commerce platform.The backend provides secure RESTful APIs for authentication, product management, shopping cart, orders, payments (Fawaterak gateway), PDF invoice generation, notifications, and real-time updates.The API is fully structured, modular, and scalable — designed to support a real business environment.
back.role: Backend Developer — Designed and implemented a secure, scalable REST API with authentication, payments, real-time updates, and PDF invoicing.

back.name: STORE APP PROJECT BACK-END
back.description: A production-ready backend system for managing inventory across all branches of AlBorg Labs.The system allows branch staff to register accounts, select their branch, and receive confirmation via email. Each branch can manage incoming orders, inventory consumption, stock audits, and report generation.The backend supports PDF & Excel reports, low-expiry notifications, real-time updates via Socket.io, and email notifications. It provides a secure and scalable API to handle multi-branch operations efficiently.
skills_Back: Middleware for security, validation, and logging
Modular, scalable, and production-ready API design
Puppeteer & Chromium for server-side PDF rendering
database: Schemas for branches, users, inventory, orders, consumption, and reports
Relations between users and branch operations
feature: User account & branch selection with email confirmation
Report generation in PDF and Excel formats
Input validation & sanitization for production readiness
back.role: Backend Developer — System Architecture & API DevelopmentResponsible for designing and implementing the backend services, RESTful APIs, authentication, notifications, reporting, and real-time inventory updates.

fullStack.name: STORE APP PROJECT FULL-STACK
fullStack.description: A production-ready backend system for managing inventory across all branches of AlBorg Labs.The system allows branch staff to register accounts, select their branch (confirmed via email), receive and process orders, track inventory consumption, perform audits, and manage the entire branch stock efficiently.The backend supports PDF & Excel report generation, expiry notifications, real-time updates via Socket.io, and automated email reports, ensuring branches can operate efficiently and securely.
skills_Back: Puppeteer & Chromium for server-side PDF rendering
database: Branches, users, inventory, orders, consumption, reports schemas
Relationships between users and branch operations
feature: User account creation with branch selection & email confirmation
CRUD operations for inventory and orders
Input validation & sanitization for production readiness
fullStack.role: Backend Developer — System Architecture & API Development Responsible for designing and implementing all backend services, RESTful APIs, authentication, reporting, notifications, and real-time inventory management.

portfolio.name: MAHMOUD PORTFOLIO PROJECT
portfolio.description: Development of a modern, fully responsive personal portfolio website built using React. The website showcases professional projects, skills, services, and contact information with smooth navigation and a clean UI design.The platform allows visitors to contact the site owner directly via Email (EmailJS integration) or WhatsApp, making communication simple and seamless.
feature: Landing / Home Section - Intro section with name, title, and call-to-action buttons
About Section - Professional bio and personal introduction
Skills Section - Clear presentation of technical skills and tools
Services Section - Overview of provided services with icon-based layout
Projects / Portfolio Section - Showcasing completed work with descriptions and links
Contact Section - Email form powered by EmailJS, Direct WhatsApp contact button, Toast notifications for form status
Navigation & UI - Fully responsive layout, Smooth scrolling between sections, Clean modern design using Bootstrap & React-Bootstrap
Validation & UX - Form validation using Formik & Yup, Error handling & user-friendly messages
portfolio.role: Designed and developed the entire website structure and UI.Implemented reusable React components and routing.Integrated EmailJS to allow sending messages directly from the site.Added WhatsApp contact functionality with one-click messaging.Applied form validation and user feedback messages.Ensured mobile-first responsive design.Deployed the project using GitHub Pages.
